entries.text: A photo by Alexander Rischer where I rearranged and added some parts.
This is the original. A flyer for the current exhibition of Alexander Rischer and Achim Hoops at Feinkunst Kr√ºger.
I took the left object out of 4 flyers so I had some material to work with. At first I thought the objects were made of wood. But as I later found out, they are very old whale bones.
